result.execSummary:
The defendant Clifford Jr. Ray III was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Felon Possess Firearm, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay appropriate costs and pay all applicable Court costs & surcharges by 08-31-15.  Failure to pay shall result in a civil judgment.

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant advised that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor and may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clifford Jr. Ray III

records.addlTxt:
Certification of transcript of proceedings of GUILTY PLEA/SENTENCING commencing JULY 1, 2015 received and filed. (30 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to THE INSTITUTION

Attorney Bridget Joy Krause in court, defendant Clifford Jr. Ray not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 7.

Attorney Bridget Joy Krause in court, defendant Clifford Jr. Ray not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 7.  Status conference scheduled for 05-20-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Clifford Jr. Ray in court with attorney Bridget Joy Krause.  Defendant Clifford Jr. Ray in custody.  Randy Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Thomas McAdams, Branch 07.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference to Branch 07.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Program Report dated 4/13/15.
css

Defendant Clifford Jr. Ray in court with attorney Bridget Joy Krause.  Ron Dague for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant was present earlier, but did leave before the case was called on the record. Defendant did return to court after being contacted by his attorney. Defendant is admonished by the Court. Due to the time of day, case cannot be commenced in a timely manner.   Court has been informed by Defense Counsel, that the defendant intends on waiving his Preliminary Hearing on the next scheduled court date.  Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status Conference in Branch PE.  Status conference scheduled for April 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Filed, Justice Point Pretrial Program Report dated 3/30/15.
